function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of quantile regression to analyze COVID-19 transmission may oversimplify the complex nature of disease diffusion and transmission.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of transmission dynamics and ineffective policy decisions.","Mitigation":"Consult with epidemiologists and public health experts to gain a comprehensive understanding of disease transmission dynamics.","Technologies":"Epidemiological models, transmission network analysis.","People":"Policy makers, public health officials, epidemiologists.","Owner":"Epidemiologists, public health experts, data analysts."}]}
